body:
Comment 4: 
I think you're right that testlib does not currently handle errorcheck and friends with
flags.  It handles -0 but nothing else.  Although interestingly the only current
failures with testlib are tests that run.go doesn't run (sinit, safe/nousesafe,
fixedbugs/bug302).

It seems to me that updating testlib to handle flags for errorcheck and run is about the
same as updating testlib to handle flags for errorcheck and to add runflags.  But if you
think a new verb is the best approach I suppose I'm OK with it.
